page.title: 18Functions of the P.Council
page.content: Rates: Liaison with the County Council fixes the Annual VillageRate. Planning: Applications for buildings, extensions are checked & comments passed to the County Planning Dept Grants: Applications are dealt with for financial aid to deserving local community projects. Local Amenities: Consultation with neighbouring Councils and appropriate action is taken over concessionary bus tokens, road & verge maintenance,snow clearance, floodwater & surface drainage. Rights of Way: County consultation regarding these and footpaths. School Governors: Nomination are offerred, in conjunction with neighbouring Councils. Public Notices: These are brought to resident's attention.
